title: 如何修改工业模组核电站爆炸范围
txt_content:
在单机也好服务器也好玩核电站都会爆炸！
单机只是存档毕竟是单机，可服务器就不一样了啊!
求大神请教 如何修改工业模组的核电站爆炸半径！

replies.author: h935047213
replies.txt_content:
在    你的客户端\.minecraft\config\IC2.ini
打开IC2.ini  在这个文件在里面找到内容:
[protection]
; Enable logging of players when they remove a machine using a wrench.
wrenchLogging = true
; Maximum Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4.
nukeExplosionPowerLimit = 60    #核弹爆炸范围？
; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
reactorExplosionPowerLimit = 45   #核电站爆炸范围？
; Enable the nuke
enableNuke = true  #是否开启核弹（包括核电站）爆炸

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
在配置文件（./config/ic2.nin）中找到
[protection]
; Enable logging of players when they remove a machine using a wrench.
wrenchLogging = true
; Maximum Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4.
nukeExplosionPowerLimit = 60      改成0
; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
reactorExplosionPowerLimit = 45   改成0 
; Enable the nuke
enableNuke = true
是在mod文件夹的ic文件中找还是在mod中找

replies.author: h935047213
replies.txt_content: 补充:如果你没有IC2.ini 这个文件，你需要带工业模组运行一次客户端
